mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: At KampanYES, we believe shopping should be exciting, not overwhelming. Our mission is to make it easy for people to discover the best deals from their favorite stores, all in one convenient place.
mission.p2: We're passionate about helping consumers save money and time by organizing promotional campaigns into easy-to-browse folders, so you never miss out on a great deal again.

what_we_do.title: What We Do
what_we_do.p1: KampanYES aggregates promotional campaigns, special offers, and exclusive discounts from a wide variety of retailers and brands. Our platform organizes these deals into intuitive folders based on categories, making it simple to find exactly what you're looking for.
what_we_do.p2: Whether you're hunting for fashion deals, electronics discounts, or grocery savings, KampanYES brings them all together in one user-friendly app.

organized_folders.label: Organized folders:
organized_folders.text: Browse deals by category, store, or type

real_time_updates.label: Real-time updates:
real_time_updates.text: Get instant notifications about new campaigns

follow_favorites.label: Follow favorites:
follow_favorites.text: Keep track of your preferred stores and never miss their offers

easy_sharing.label: Easy sharing:
easy_sharing.text: Share great deals with friends and family instantly

team.title: Our Team
team.p1: We're a dedicated team of developers, designers, and deal enthusiasts who understand the value of smart shopping. We're constantly working to improve KampanYES and add new features that make your deal-hunting experience even better.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.p1: Have questions, feedback, or partnership inquiries? We'd love to hear from you!
